author: wpcarvalho
body:
#### PR description:

The proposed code will allow to save PPS geometry in the conditions database. It comprises:

- The persistent class PDetGeomDesc and related files
- The record VeryForwardIdealGeometryRecord
- The builder PPSGeometryBuilder and related files
- Configuration files geometryIdealPPSFromDD_201[6,7,8]_cfi.py with the xml description used by the builder to create the geometry conditions.
